text: Ever since he won the lottery, John has been living like a maggot in bacon. The phrase 'living like a maggot in bacon' most nearly means:
explanation: The idiom means living in extreme comfort or luxury, enjoying abundance.

choices.text: living in great comfort or luxury

text: Despite the storm, the villagers kept their heads above water. The phrase 'kept their heads above water' most nearly means:
explanation: The idiom means managing to survive, especially financially or under pressure.

text: When she spoke in the meeting, she cut to the chase. The phrase 'cut to the chase' most nearly means:
explanation: It means to get to the point without wasting time.

text: After months of hard work, he finally hit the nail on the head with his proposal. The phrase 'hit the nail on the head' most nearly means:
explanation: It means to do or say something exactly right or accurate.

choices.text: do or say something exactly right

text: She decided to bite the bullet and confront her fears. The phrase 'bite the bullet' most nearly means:
explanation: It means to endure a painful or difficult situation with courage.

text: Choose the word most similar in meaning to 'abundant'.
explanation: ‘Abundant’ means plentiful or in great quantity.

text: Which word is the opposite of 'hostile'?
explanation: The opposite of ‘hostile’ is ‘friendly’.

text: Choose the word that best completes the analogy: Courage is to brave as wisdom is to ____.
explanation: Someone who shows wisdom is wise.

text: Choose the correct meaning of the word 'metamorphosis'.
explanation: ‘Metamorphosis’ means a complete change in form or nature.

text: Which word is closest in meaning to 'ambiguous'?
explanation: ‘Ambiguous’ means unclear or having multiple interpretations.

text: Find the synonym of 'vanish'.
explanation: ‘Vanish’ means to disappear.

text: Choose the word opposite in meaning to 'prosperity'.
explanation: The opposite of ‘prosperity’ (wealth) is ‘poverty’.

text: What is the synonym of 'infer'?
explanation: ‘Infer’ means to conclude from evidence.

text: Which word means 'to make something less severe'?
explanation: ‘Alleviate’ means to reduce or lessen severity.

text: Choose the correct synonym of 'candid'.
explanation: ‘Candid’ means honest or straightforward.

text: Which word is most similar in meaning to 'serene'?
explanation: ‘Serene’ means calm and peaceful.

text: What is the opposite of 'deteriorate'?
explanation: ‘Deteriorate’ means to worsen; the opposite is ‘improve’.

text: Find the meaning of the word 'eloquent'.
explanation: ‘Eloquent’ means fluent or persuasive in speech or writing.

text: Choose the synonym of 'obsolete'.
explanation: ‘Obsolete’ means out of date or no longer in use.

text: Select the word that is opposite in meaning to 'fragile'.
explanation: The opposite of ‘fragile’ (easily broken) is ‘durable’.

text: Choose the word that best fits: His explanation was so ____ that no one understood.
explanation: ‘Vague’ means unclear or not specific.

text: What is the meaning of 'scrutinize'?
explanation: ‘Scrutinize’ means to examine closely.

text: Which word is a synonym of 'tedious'?
explanation: ‘Tedious’ means boring or repetitive.

text: Select the word that means 'showing great attention to detail'.
explanation: ‘Meticulous’ means very careful and precise.

text: What is the opposite of 'expand'?
explanation: The opposite of expand is contract.

text: Choose the word that best completes the sentence: She gave a ____ answer, avoiding the main issue.
explanation: ‘Evasive’ means avoiding the question directly.

text: Find the synonym of 'vivid'.
explanation: ‘Vivid’ means bright, clear, or detailed.

text: Which word means 'to support or strengthen'?
explanation: ‘Reinforce’ means to support or make stronger.

text: Choose the word most similar in meaning to 'lenient'.
explanation: ‘Lenient’ means permissive or tolerant.

text: What is the antonym of 'conceal'?
explanation: The opposite of ‘conceal’ (hide) is ‘reveal’ (show).

text: Which word best completes the sentence: The witness gave a ____ account of the incident.
explanation: ‘Credible’ means believable or trustworthy.

text: Find the synonym of 'impartial'.
explanation: ‘Impartial’ means fair and not biased.

text: Choose the word most opposite in meaning to 'diminish'.
explanation: ‘Diminish’ means reduce; the opposite is ‘increase’.

text: Sa ilalim ng buwan, narinig ko ang mahina ngunit malamyos niyang tinig, isang tinig na para bang sumasalamin sa kalangitan at kumakanta sa hangin. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'MALAMYOS' ay:
explanation: 'Malamyos' ay nangangahulugang malambing, mahinahon, at may magandang tunog.

text: Batid kong ang iyong hangarin ay dakila, subalit kailangan mong pagtiisan ang mga pagsubok upang matupad ito. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'BATID' ay:
explanation: 'Batid' ay nangangahulugang alam o may kaalaman sa isang bagay.

text: Hindi ko maarok ang buong lalim ng kaniyang damdamin — naglaho siya nang parang bula sa hangin. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'MAAROK' ay:
explanation: 'Maarok' ay nangangahulugang maunawaan o maintindihan ng lubusan.

text: Ang silakbo ng kanyang galit ay tila isang sigwa na handang yumanig sa buong baryo. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'SILAKBO' ay:
explanation: 'Silakbo' ay biglang pagputok o labis na pagdaloy ng damdamin, tulad ng galit o sigla.

text: Sa gitna ng unos, may isang banaag ng liwanag: ang tapang at pananampalataya ng bayan. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'BANAAG' ay:
explanation: 'Banaag' ay maliit na liwanag, simula ng pag-asa, o sinag sa dilim.

text: Matapos ang lahat ng unos, may nagniningning na sigla sa kaniyang mga mata — isang maliwanag na bantayog ng bagong bukang-liwayway. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'SIGLA' ay:
explanation: 'Sigla' ay lakas, enerhiya, o kasiglahan ng katawan o damdamin.

text: Tila ba ang mga bituin ay bumabagtas sa kalangitan at sumasayaw sa tugtugin ng hangin. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'BUMABAGTAS' ay:
explanation: 'Bumabagtas' ay tumatahak o dumadaan sa isang landas, karaniwan sa poetic o malalim na Tagalog.

text: Nananalangin siya sa harap ng dambana — humihiling ng awa at kalinga para sa mga dukha. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'DAMBANA' ay:
explanation: 'Dambana' ay altar o sagradong lugar kung saan isinasagawa ang panalangin o ritwal.

text: Marahil ay huwad ang ngiting iyon — may itinatagong lihim at kasinungalingan. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'HUWAD' ay:
explanation: 'Huwad' ay peke, hindi totoo, o may panlilinlang.

text: Hindi ito basta aklat, kundi isang aklat ng alaala — puno ng mga karanasang humubog sa pagkatao. Ang ibig sabihin ng salitang 'AKLAT' ay:
explanation: 'Aklat' ay libro o koleksyon ng nakasulat na kaalaman o karanasan.
